===Duel: Arataki Itto===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before the first Action Phase)
:{{A|Vo card itto event special 01.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Hahaha! We're gonna make this the most exhilarating TCG duel ever, compadre!
:{{A|Vo card shinobu event special 01.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' I don't think either side will have a good time dealing with Boss's deck...

;(When the player defeats one of Arataki Itto's Character Cards)
:{{A|Vo card itto event special 02.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Nothing I've never seen!

;(When the player defeats two of Arataki Itto's Character Cards)
:{{A|Vo card shinobu event special 02.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' Boss... You're gonna lose if you keep this up.
:{{A|Vo card itto event special 03.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Hey... chill! Lemme show you what happens when Numero Uno goes mano a mano.
:{{A|Vo card shinobu event special 03.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' Mano a mano? We're still talking about cards right?

;(When Arataki Itto defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|Vo card itto event special 04.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Hahaha! Now you see what the champ is capable of!
:{{A|Vo card shinobu event special 04.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' You have my deck to thank for that...

;(When Arataki Itto uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|Vo card itto event special 05.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Take this, compadre!

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo dpeq003 4 itto 16.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Huh, I can't believe I lost.
:{{A|vo dpeq003 4 shinobu 08.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' And I can't believe your deck won. That takes some serious skill.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo dpeq003 4 itto 17.ogg}} '''Arataki Itto:''' Hahaha! See, my theory was correct!
:{{A|vo dpeq003 4 shinobu 09.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' Don't let it get to you... You were using Boss's deck, after all.
{{Dialogue End}}
